author: #s#8059
description: Configure the slowmode of a channel that you currently are not typing in. Useful when you want to change the slowmode, but do not want to disturb a currently active channel with a bot command (or when the execution of such a command can cause even more activity).
install_msg: Thank you for installing this cog! This cog should be pretty much plug and play, hope you enjoy it!
name: ChannelSlowmode
